meanings.definition: A food produced by bacterial fermentation of milk
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating yogourt with fruit for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: She bought a tub of yogourt from the store.
meanings.sent3: The yogourt decided to take a vacation from the fridge.
meanings.sent4: The yogourt was a silent artist, transforming milk into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The tangy yogourt danced on my taste buds.

meanings.definition: A creamy, often sweetened food made from milk curdled by bacteria
meanings.sent1: My favorite dessert is a parfait with layers of yogourt and granola.
meanings.sent2: The children giggled as they spooned the sweet yogourt into their mouths.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to steal a lick of the yogourt.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as creamy and comforting as a bowl of yogourt.
meanings.sent5: The yogourt was a cool, creamy oasis in the desert of flavors.
